entry.title: web作业：导航栏
entry.content:
WEB前端作业：普通导航栏

#导航栏代码块：<html>
<head>

    <meta charset="utf-8">    <title>导航栏</title>    <style type="text/css">        #nav{ }        ul{list-style-type: none;        margin-left:100px;  }     li {float: left;padding: 0;margin: 0;text-align: center;}    li a{color: #FFFFFF;    text-decoration: none;    display: block;     padding:5px 30px;    height: 40px;    width: 120px;    line-height: 40px;    text-align: center;    background-color: crimson;}    li a:hover{color: black;background: #7FFF00;width: 120px;height: 50px;}</style></head><body>    <div id="nav">     <ul>    <li><a href="">HomePage</a></li>     <li><a href="">Div+CSS教程</a></li>     <li><a href="">CSS布局实例</a></li>     <li><a href="">CSS2.0教程 </a></li>     <li><a href="">CSS在线手册</a></li>     <li><a href="">Web标准</a></li>    <li><a href="">XHTML教程</a></li>     </ul>     </div></body></html>

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
